variables.name: ENABLE_CURSOR_DRAG_FROM_ANYWHERE
variables.comment: * Whether starting a cursor drag from anywhere in the text should be enabled.

variables.name: KEY_ENABLE_CURSOR_DRAG_FROM_ANYWHERE
variables.comment: * The key used in app core settings for the flag {@link #ENABLE_CURSOR_DRAG_FROM_ANYWHERE}.

variables.name: ENABLE_CURSOR_DRAG_FROM_ANYWHERE_DEFAULT
variables.comment: * Default value for the flag {@link #ENABLE_CURSOR_DRAG_FROM_ANYWHERE}.

variables.name: CURSOR_DRAG_MIN_ANGLE_FROM_VERTICAL
variables.comment:
* Threshold for the direction of a swipe gesture in order for it to be handled as a cursor drag
     * rather than a scroll. The direction angle of the swipe gesture must exceed this value in
     * order to trigger cursor drag; otherwise, the swipe will be assumed to be a scroll gesture.
     * The value units for this flag is degrees and the valid range is [0,90] inclusive. If a value
     * < 0 is set, 0 will be used instead; if a value > 90 is set, 90 will be used instead.

variables.name: KEY_CURSOR_DRAG_MIN_ANGLE_FROM_VERTICAL
variables.comment:
* The key used in app core settings for the flag
     * {@link #CURSOR_DRAG_MIN_ANGLE_FROM_VERTICAL}.

variables.name: CURSOR_DRAG_MIN_ANGLE_FROM_VERTICAL_DEFAULT
variables.comment: * Default value for the flag {@link #CURSOR_DRAG_MIN_ANGLE_FROM_VERTICAL}.

variables.name: FINGER_TO_CURSOR_DISTANCE
variables.comment:
* The flag of finger-to-cursor distance in DP for cursor dragging.
     * The value unit is DP and the range is {0..100}. If the value is out of range, the legacy
     * value, which is based on handle size, will be used.

variables.name: KEY_FINGER_TO_CURSOR_DISTANCE
variables.comment: * The key used in app core settings for the flag {@link #FINGER_TO_CURSOR_DISTANCE}.

variables.name: FINGER_TO_CURSOR_DISTANCE_DEFAULT
variables.comment: * Default value for the flag {@link #FINGER_TO_CURSOR_DISTANCE}.

variables.name: ENABLE_INSERTION_HANDLE_GESTURES
variables.comment:
* Whether additional gestures should be enabled for the insertion cursor handle (e.g.
     * long-press or double-tap on the handle to trigger selection).

variables.name: KEY_ENABLE_INSERTION_HANDLE_GESTURES
variables.comment: * The key used in app core settings for the flag {@link #ENABLE_INSERTION_HANDLE_GESTURES}.

variables.name: ENABLE_INSERTION_HANDLE_GESTURES_DEFAULT
variables.comment: * Default value for the flag {@link #ENABLE_INSERTION_HANDLE_GESTURES}.

variables.name: INSERTION_HANDLE_DELTA_HEIGHT
variables.comment: * The flag of delta height applies to the insertion handle when cursor control flag is enabled.

variables.name: KEY_INSERTION_HANDLE_DELTA_HEIGHT
variables.comment: * The key name used in app core settings for {@link #INSERTION_HANDLE_DELTA_HEIGHT}.

variables.name: INSERTION_HANDLE_DELTA_HEIGHT_DEFAULT
variables.comment: * Default value for the flag {@link #INSERTION_HANDLE_DELTA_HEIGHT}.

variables.name: INSERTION_HANDLE_OPACITY
variables.comment:
* The flag of opacity applies to the insertion handle when cursor control flag is enabled.
     * The opacity value is in the range of {0..100}.

variables.name: KEY_INSERTION_HANDLE_OPACITY
variables.comment: * The key name used in app core settings for {@link #INSERTION_HANDLE_OPACITY}.

variables.name: INSERTION_HANDLE_OPACITY_DEFAULT
variables.comment: * Default value for the flag {@link #INSERTION_HANDLE_OPACITY}.

variables.name: LINE_SLOP_RATIO
variables.comment:
* The flag of line slop ratio applies to cursor movement.
     * Note: the actual slop value is bound: lineHeight + slop within the range of {8dp..45dp}.

variables.name: KEY_LINE_SLOP_RATIO
variables.comment: * The key name used in app core settings for {@link #LINE_SLOP_RATIO}.

variables.name: LINE_SLOP_RATIO_DEFAULT
variables.comment: * Default value for the flag {@link #LINE_SLOP_RATIO}.

variables.name: ENABLE_NEW_MAGNIFIER
variables.comment: * The flag of enabling the new magnifier.

variables.name: KEY_ENABLE_NEW_MAGNIFIER
variables.comment: * The key name used in app core settings for {@link #ENABLE_NEW_MAGNIFIER}.

variables.name: ENABLE_NEW_MAGNIFIER_DEFAULT
variables.comment: * Default value for the flag {@link #ENABLE_NEW_MAGNIFIER}.

variables.name: MAGNIFIER_ZOOM_FACTOR
variables.comment: * The flag of zoom factor applies to the new magnifier.

variables.name: KEY_MAGNIFIER_ZOOM_FACTOR
variables.comment: * The key name used in app core settings for {@link #MAGNIFIER_ZOOM_FACTOR}.

variables.name: MAGNIFIER_ZOOM_FACTOR_DEFAULT
variables.comment: * Default value for the flag {@link #MAGNIFIER_ZOOM_FACTOR}.

variables.name: MAGNIFIER_ASPECT_RATIO
variables.comment: * The flag of aspect ratio (width/height) applies to the new magnifier.

variables.name: KEY_MAGNIFIER_ASPECT_RATIO
variables.comment: * The key name used in app core settings for {@link #MAGNIFIER_ASPECT_RATIO}.

variables.name: MAGNIFIER_ASPECT_RATIO_DEFAULT
variables.comment: * Default value for the flag {@link #MAGNIFIER_ASPECT_RATIO}.

variables.name: ANALOG_CLOCK_SECONDS_HAND_FPS
variables.comment: The flag of the fps of the analog clock seconds hand.

variables.name: KEY_ANALOG_CLOCK_SECONDS_HAND_FPS
variables.comment: The key name used in app core settings for {@link #ANALOG_CLOCK_SECONDS_HAND_FPS}.
